name: MySouthernHills
0:
”Alexa, open My Southern Hills”
”Alexa, ask My Southern Hills for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start My Southern Hills”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my southern hills
des: Listen to the latest talks from your Southern Hills Baptist Church in Tulsa. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Follow us on instagram @mysouthernhills. Thanks for listening and we hope to see you Sunday at 56th and Lewis.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
